participant_1.background:
I am happy and healthy at my current weight.
I like to spend time with my family in different ways.
my favorite book that i have read lately is middlesex.
i have a large mustache.
I'm always building models of sports cars, so I guess racing is my favorite sport.

participant_2.background:
My family is important to me, but my job is demanding and I don't always get to see them as much as I would like.
I don't mind the rain, because it helps me drown out my terrible singing voice.
In my free time, I like to go on road trips with my Ford truck.
I am a person who likes to express myself through tattoos and music.
i have been in band all four years of high school.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Hi, I'm doing well! It's a beautiful day out. How about you?
It is indeed! What are your plans for the day?
I'm not sure yet. I might go for a walk or read a book. What about you?
I'm going to go for a run. I've been building models of sports cars lately. I love racing. What do you do for fun?
I like to go on road trips with my Ford truck. I also like to express myself through tattoos and music.
That sounds fun! I've been wanting to get a tattoo for a while now. Do you have any tattoos?
I have a few. I'm actually getting another one next week.
Oh cool! What kind of tattoo are you getting?
It's a tattoo of a guitar. I'm a musician and I love playing guitar.
That's awesome! I love music too. I play the drums.
That's great! I love drums. They're so much fun to play.
Yeah they are! I'm glad we have something in common
